name: expend
content:

Add to word list
to use or spend time, effort, or money: You expend so much effort for so little return.expend something on something Governments expend a lot of resources on war.

to use or spend something, esp. time, effort, or money: They expend all their energy fixing up their house.

to use or spend something, especially time, effort, or money: expend energy/effort/time Why do firms expend effort investing abroad, rather than staying home and producing for export? expend money/resources/funds Managers had to expend a lot of time dealing with the consequences of the incident.
